page.title: 10SCHOOLS IN CRANHAM
page.content: There are five schools in our area. There are two secondary schools,{Hall {Mead and Coopers Company and Coburn. There are three infants and junior schools,{Upminster School, Engayne {School and Oglethorpe School. Junior school starts at 8.55 and ends at 3.30 with lunch from 12 to 1.20. Senior schools have a slighty longer day.Junior children learn maths, English,art and craft,history, geography and music.Children go to senior schools from 11 to 16 and some stay on until 18. Important events at the junior schools include Sports Day, Harvest Festival,Summer Fair,Christmas Concert,Christmas Fair,Open Evening. Parents organise events to raise money to help the school.Many children are taken on trips to places of interest including France.
